trans-unit.source: Converts instances of various types to and from instances of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 将转换的各种类型的实例的实例与<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>类。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of the specified type can be converted to an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定类型的实例是否可以转换为的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This converter can convert from the following types: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64> - <xref:System.Byte>
trans-unit.target: This converter can convert from the following types: - <xref:System.String> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Single> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int16> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.Int64> - <xref:System.UInt16> - <xref:System.UInt32> - <xref:System.UInt64> - <xref:System.Byte></xref:System.Byte></xref:System.UInt64></xref:System.UInt32></xref:System.UInt16></xref:System.Int64></xref:System.Int32></xref:System.Int16></xref:System.Double></xref:System.Single></xref:System.Decimal></xref:System.String>
